5.0 out of 5 stars  
Technically the most beautiful phone I 've ever seen.  
  
When i saw it for the 1st time, fell in love with it and made my mind that
this is the one i was looking after using Redmi Note 4 for 3 long years. If
want something different then this will impress you badly.  
So finally made the purchase and got it for 12k bucks as I have exchanged my
old phone.  
After using for couple of weeks this phone is fast (no lag at all) , easily
holdable, and Gold is just beautiful.  
Camera is awesome, screen is one of the most refined, speaker is above
average, overall built is sleek and great.

Nice product with great camera & specification with reasonable price. Should
go for it.

Nice one. Delivered bit earlier. Mob looking very sleek and handy. Very nice
to use
